title: I have to reinstall the client every single time
body: I recently was approved to use alpha client, the client looks very neat and organised. The only trouble that I have is that I have to reinstall the client in order to use which requires a 1320mb download. I think this is because I still have the older client on my computer, anyone know the solution to this?

replies.body: Im having the exact same problem too! By any chance are you on a mac? It may be a bug for macs only.
I AGREE I just got access and have the exact same problem

I still have the older client on my computer, nor did I encounter problems with having it still installed. Your problem could be related to still having the old client installed but it seems unlikely. I'm upvoting this to try and get Riot to ask the right questions for what's going on. Surely someone will be able to help you.
Good luck{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
